opinion.caption: JACK STAMPER COMMISSIONER OF CHARITIES AND CORRECTIONS
opinion.opinion_byline: JAN ERIC CARTWRIGHT, ATTORNEY GENERAL OF OKLAHOMA
opinion.opinion_text: OPINION — AG — FROM JULY 1, 1978 TO JANUARY 8, 1979, THOSE CHARITIES AFFECTED BY HOUSE BILL NO. 1478, THIRTY SIX LEG., SECT. 1-10 SHALL REGISTER PURSUANT THERETO WITH THE COMMISSIONER OF CHARITIES AND CORRECTIONS. CITE: 18 O.S. 1977 Supp., 552.3 [18-552.3], 18 O.S. 1977 Supp., 552.4 [18-552.4] [18-552.4] (JOSEPH J. REINKE)
